captions.text: Lim chang jung m/v

I do the laundries
That's been piling up

I take a shower as if
I'm washing it away

A friend called me to have
A drink, and I go to empty my mind

I walk and walk thinking about you
I cry because I miss you so much

The songs on the street sounds
Like my story, story of you and me

This is the most ordinary song
Listen to it
This is a song sung by everyone

You can't cry no matter how sad
You just need to let it go like a ordinary breakup
Just like ordinary song lyrics

Everyone is full of wounds
In front of love

You left me
With a hurt heart

That song we used to sang together
It's a story of us, story of you and me

This is the most ordinary song
Listen to it
This is a song sung by everyone

You can't cry no matter how sad
You just need to let it go like a ordinary break up
Just like ordinary song lyrics

I can't forget about you
I can't let you go

Come back to me 
after hearing this song

This is the most ordinary song
(This is the most ordinary song, listen to it)

Listen to it
(This is a song sung by everyone)

You can't cry no matter how sad
You just need to let it go like a ordinary breakup
Just like ordinary song lyrics

Ordinary song
Lim chang jung

title: [MV] LIM CHANG JUNG(임창정) _ Ordinary Song(흔한 노래)
